Features.Name: Camera
Features.Positive characteristics: Top-notch video and camera quality, photos turn out phenomenal, stable videos, high-quality sound from speakers

Features.Name: Battery
Features.Positive characteristics: Good battery life, lasts about 14 hours

Features.Name: Box condition
Features.Positive characteristics: Great saving on price compared to other outlets

Features.Name: Performance
Features.Negative characteristics: Phone constantly lags, slow to respond to commands, frequently turns on and off by itself, touch screen is unresponsive, frustrating to use, gets warm easily

Features.Name: Design
Features.Negative characteristics: Disappointing looks, expensive for what it is
